languages.text: "Офицер Хротко же уверен, что это недобитые культисты Войгтвира. Но я считаю, что кровь — предупреждение, а не угроза. Осталось узнать — от кого и о чем".

"Meanwhile, Captain Hrotko is convinced that it was the work of Voigtvir's surviving cultists. However, I believe this to be a warning rather than a threat. What we need to establish is who is trying to warn us, and of what."
languages.original_text: "Офицер Хротко же уверен, что это недобитые культисты Войгтвира. Но я считаю, что кровь — предупреждение, а не угроза. Осталось узнать — от кого и о чем".

traits.locale_text: "Meanwhile, Officer Hrotko is convinced that it was the work of Voigtvir's surviving cultists. However, I believe this to be a warning rather than a threat. What we need to establish is who is trying to warn us and of what."

"Meanwhile, Officer Hrotko is convinced that it was the work of Voigtvir's surviving cultists. However, I believe this to be a warning rather than a threat. What we need to establish is who is trying to warn us and of what."

"Meanwhile, Officer Hrotko is convinced that it was the work of Voigtvir's surviving cultists. However, I believe this to be a warning rather than a threat. What we need to establish is who is trying to warn us, and of what."

"Meanwhile, Officer Hrotko is convinced that it was the work of Voigtvir's surviving cultists. However, I believe this to be a warning rather than a threat. What we need to establish is who is trying to warn us, and of what."

"Meanwhile, Captain Hrotko is convinced that it was the work of Voigtvir's surviving cultists. However, I believe this to be a warning rather than a threat. What we need to establish is who is trying to warn us, and of what."

"Meanwhile, Captain Hrotko is convinced that it was the work of Voigtvir's surviving cultists. However, I believe this to be a warning rather than a threat. What we need to establish is who is trying to warn us, and of what."

languages.text: « Si le capitaine Hrotko est convaincu que nous avons affaire aux sbires rescapés de Voigtvir, je pense pour ma part que c'est un avertissement plutôt qu'une menace. Reste à savoir qui cherche à nous mettre en garde, et pourquoi. »
languages.original_text: "Meanwhile, Captain Hrotko is convinced that it was the work of Voigtvir's surviving cultists. However, I believe this to be a warning rather than a threat. What we need to establish is who is trying to warn us, and of what."

traits.locale_text: « Si l'officier Hrotko est convaincu que nous avons affaire aux sbires rescapés de Voigtvir, je pense pour ma part que c'est un avertissement plutôt qu'une menace. Reste à savoir qui cherche à nous mettre en garde, et pourquoi. »

languages.text: «Mientras tanto, el capitán Hrotko está convencido de que esto es obra de los cultistas de Voigtvir que sobrevivieron. Por mi parte, considero que es más una advertencia que una amenaza. Lo que tenemos que hacer es establecer quién intenta advertirnos de qué».
languages.original_text: "Meanwhile, Captain Hrotko is convinced that it was the work of Voigtvir's surviving cultists. However, I believe this to be a warning rather than a threat. What we need to establish is who is trying to warn us, and of what."

traits.locale_text: «Mientras tanto, el oficial Hrotko está convencido de que esto es obra de los cultistas de Voigtvir que sobrevivieron. Por mi parte, considero que es más una advertencia que una amenaza. Lo que tenemos que hacer es establecer quién intenta advertirnos de qué».

languages.text: “赫洛卡上尉确信，这肯定是维特威尔的邪教徒残党所为。不过，我觉得这并不是威胁，而是某种警告。我们需要确定是谁在试图警告我们，以及这个人想要警告我们什么。”
languages.original_text: "Meanwhile, Captain Hrotko is convinced that it was the work of Voigtvir's surviving cultists. However, I believe this to be a warning rather than a threat. What we need to establish is who is trying to warn us, and of what."

traits.locale_text: “赫洛卡军官确信，这肯定是维特威尔的邪教徒残党所为。不过，我觉得这并不是威胁，而是某种警告。我们需要确定是谁在试图警告我们，以及这个人想要警告我们什么。”

languages.text: 「一方、フロトコ中隊長はボイドヴィルのカルト教団の生き残りの仕業だと確信しています。しかし、これは脅威というかは警告だと思います。誰が何を警告しようとしているのか、それを明らかにする必要があります」
languages.original_text: "Meanwhile, Captain Hrotko is convinced that it was the work of Voigtvir's surviving cultists. However, I believe this to be a warning rather than a threat. What we need to establish is who is trying to warn us, and of what."

traits.locale_text: 「一方、フロトコ巡査はボイドヴィルのカルト教団の生き残りの仕業だと確信しています。しかし、これは脅威というかは警告だと思います。誰が何を警告しようとしているのか、それを明らかにする必要があります」

languages.text: "Captain Hrotko ist derweil überzeugt, dass es das Werk von Voigtvirs überlebenden Kultisten war. Ich dagegen halte das für eine Warnung, nicht für eine Drohung. Wir müssen nur herausfinden, wer uns zu warnen versucht. Und wovor."
languages.original_text: "Meanwhile, Captain Hrotko is convinced that it was the work of Voigtvir's surviving cultists. However, I believe this to be a warning rather than a threat. What we need to establish is who is trying to warn us, and of what."

traits.locale_text: "Offizier Hrotko ist derweil überzeugt, dass es das Werk von Voigtvirs überlebenden Kultisten war. Ich dagegen halte das für eine Warnung, nicht für eine Drohung. Wir müssen nur herausfinden, wer uns zu warnen versucht. Und wovor."

languages.text: "Bu esnada Komutan Hrotko da bunun Voigtvir'in hayatta kalan tarikatçılarının işi olduğundan emin. Ancak ben bunun tehditten ziyade bir uyarı olduğuna inanıyorum. Bizi kimin, ne maksatla uyardığını tespit etmeliyiz."
languages.original_text: "Meanwhile, Captain Hrotko is convinced that it was the work of Voigtvir's surviving cultists. However, I believe this to be a warning rather than a threat. What we need to establish is who is trying to warn us, and of what."
